card.name: King Foltest
card.text: Spawn: Foltest. Deploy: Boost all Loyal Bronze and Silver Units in your Hand and Deck by 1.

card.name: King Henselt
card.text: Spawn Henselt. Deploy: Choose a Bronze Ally. Play all copies of it from your Deck.

card.name: King Radovid V
card.text: Spawn: Radovid. Deploy: Toggle 2 Units' Lock. If Enemies, Damage them by 4 as well.

card.name: Bloody Baron
card.text: If this Unit is in your Deck at the end of the Round, place it on top. Whenever an Enemy is Destroyed during a Round while this Unit is in your Deck, Boost it by 1.

card.name: Dandelion
card.text: Deploy: Boost up to 3 Bronze or Silver Units in your Deck by 3. Shuffle the others back.

card.name: John Natalis
card.text: Deploy: Force all Northern Realms Machine Allies to Damage a random Enemy by 2.

card.name: Keira Metz
card.text: Deploy: Spawn Quen Sign, Epidemic or Thunderbolt Potion.

card.name: Philippa Eilhart
card.text: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 5, then Damage random Enemies by 4, 3, 2 and 1. The same Enemy cannot be Damaged twice in a row.

card.name: Priscilla
card.text: Every turn, at the end of your turn, Boost a random Ally (but never self) by 3. Ability discontinues after the Unit Boosts Allies 4 times without leaving the Board.

card.name: Shani
card.text: Deploy: Resurrect a Unit and add 4 Armor to it.

card.name: Sigismund Dijkstra
card.text: Deploy: Play the top 2 cards in your Deck.

card.name: Triss: Butterfly Spell
card.text: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Boost all other Lowest Allies by 1.

card.name: Vernon Roche
card.text: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 3. If it was Destroyed, Spawn a Blue Stripes Commando on a random row and repeat the Deploy ability (one time only).

card.name: Botchling
card.text: Deploy: Boost all Lubberkins in your Hand, Deck and Graveyard by 5. Deathwish: Play a Lubberkin from your Deck.

card.name: Dethmold
card.text: Deploy: Spawn Torrential Rain, Clear Skies or Alzur's Thunder.

card.name: Lubberkin
card.text: Deploy: Boost all Botchlings in your Hand, Deck and Graveyard by 5. Deathwish: Play a Botchling from your Deck.

card.name: Margarita of Aretuza
card.text: Deploy: Reset a Unit and toggle its Lock.

card.name: Nenneke
card.text: Deploy: Shuffle up to 3 cards from your Graveyard into your Deck.

card.name: Odrin
card.text: Every turn, at the start of your turn, move this Unit to a random row and Boost all Units on it by 1.

card.name: Prince Stennis
card.text: Every 2 turns, at the start of your turn, Boost this Unit by the number of Machine Allies. Crewmen 1. Deploy: Gain 2 Armor.

card.name: Princess Pavetta
card.text: Deploy: If neither player has passed, shuffle the Lowest Ally into your Deck, then shuffle the Lowest Enemy into your opponent's Deck. Does not affect Pavetta.

card.name: Reinforcements-
card.text: Play a Bronze or Silver Unit from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.

card.name: Sabrina Glevissig
card.text: Deathwish: Set all Units on the row to the Power of the Lowest Unit on the row.

card.name: Síle de Tansarville
card.text: Deploy: You may play a Bronze Special card from your Hand. If you do, draw the top card from your Deck.

card.name: Thaler
card.text: Deploy: Draw the top 2 cards from your Deck. Keep 1 and shuffle the other back.

card.name: Trollololo
card.text: Counts as part of any Northern Realms Trio on the row. Deploy: Gain 5 Armor.

card.name: Ves
card.text: Whenever you complete a Northern Realms Trio, play this Unit from your Deck.

card.name: Aretuza Adept
card.text: Deploy: Play a random Bronze Weather card from your Deck.

card.name: Ballista
card.text: Deploy: Damage an Enemy and up to 3 other random Enemies with the same Power by 1. Fresh Crew: Repeat the Deploy ability.

card.name: Blue Stripe Commando
card.text: Whenever a different Ally with the same Power as this Unit is played, play this Unit from your Deck (1 copy max) and place it on that Ally's row. Whenever you complete a Blue Stripes Commando Trio, create 1 base copy of a Blue Stripes Commando on the bottom of your Deck.

card.name: Blue Stripe Scout
card.text: Deploy: Gain 2 Armor. Deploy: Clear weather from the row on your side Crewmen: 1.

card.name: Dun Banner
card.text: If at the start of your turn you have not passed and are losing the Round by more than 20 Power, play this Unit from your Deck

card.name: Field Medic
card.text: Deploy: Choose a different Bronze Ally and shuffle it back into your Deck, then play a random Bronze Unit from your Deck.

card.name: Kaedweni Cavalry
card.text: Deploy: Remove Armor from 2 Units and Boost self by the amount of Armor removed.

card.name: Kaedweni Sergeant
card.text: Deploy: Boost by 1 this Unit and all Bronze Loyal Units with the same Power in your Hand, Deck or on your side of the Board. Crewmen 1.

card.name: Reaver Hunter
card.text: Deploy or Bond: Boost all Reaver Hunters in your Hand, Deck and on your side of the Board by 1. When a Revear Hunter Trio is completed, Damage the Highest Enemy by half its Power (rounding down and ignoring Armor).

card.name: Reaver Scout
card.text: Deploy: Choose a different Bronze Ally. Play a copy of it from your Deck.

card.name: Redanian Elite
card.text: Whenever this Unit's Armor reaches 0, Boost self by 5. Deploy: Gain 4 Armor.

card.name: Redanian Knight
card.text: Every turn, at the start of your turn, if this Unit has no Armor, Boost it by 2 and add 2 Armor to it.

card.name: Redanian Knight-Elect
card.text: If this Unit has Armor at the start of your turn, Boost Units adjacent to it by 1. Deploy: Gain 2 Armor.

card.name: Reinforced Ballista
card.text: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 2. Fresh Crew: Repeat the Deploy ability.

card.name: Reinforced Trebuchet
card.text: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage a random Enemy by 1.

card.name: Siege Master
card.text: Deploy: Return a Machine Ally to your Hand and immediately play it again. Crewmen 1.

card.name: Siege Support
card.text: Whenever an Ally appears, Boost it by 1. If it's a Machine, Boost it by 1 and add 1 Armor. Crewmen 1.

card.name: Siege Tower
card.text: Deploy: Add 2 Armor to Units adjacent to this Unit. Fresh Crew: Boost self by 3.

card.name: Temerian Infantry
card.text: Deploy: Play all Temerian Infantrymen from your Deck.

card.name: Tridam Infantry
card.text: Deploy: Gain 3 Armor.

card.name: Trebuchet
card.text: Deploy: Damage 3 Adjacent Units by 1. Fresh Crew: Increase the Damage dealt by 1.

card.name: Avallac'h
card.text: Deploy: If neither player has passed, both players draw the top 2 cards from their Deck.

card.name: Chironex

prop.type: Siege, Doomed, Beast, Loyal, Yennefer Token

card.text: Deploy: Damage all other Units by 2.

card.name: Ciri
card.text: At the end of the Round, return this Unit to your Hand if you lost.

card.name: Ciri: Dash
card.text: When this Unit enters the Graveyard, Strengthen it by 3 and shuffle it back into your Deck.

card.name: Dudu
card.text: Deploy: Choose an Enemy and copy its Power.

card.name: Eskel
card.text: Play Vesemir and Lambert from your deck.

card.name: Francis Bedlam
card.text: Deploy, Brave: Strengthen self enough to tie the Round or to a maximum of 15 base Power.

card.name: Gaunter O'Dimm
card.text: Deploy: Guess whether a random Bronze or Silver Unit from your opponent’s Deck is Higher or Lower than 5. Success: Play any card from your Deck. Shuffle the others back. Failure: Your opponent draws the top Bronze or Silver card from their Deck. Tie: Both players draw the top Bronze or Silver card from their Deck.

card.name: Geralt of Rivia
card.text: Deploy, Brave: Strengthen self by 3.

card.name: Geralt: Aard
card.text: Deploy: Push 5 adjacent Enemies on the row above them and Damage them by 2.

card.name: Geralt: Igni
card.text: Destroy the strongest non-Gold unit(s) on the opposite row if that row totals 20 or more strength.

card.name: Iris von Everec
card.text: Deathwish: Boost all Units on the other side of the Board by 3.

card.name: Johnny
card.text: Deploy: Discard a card in your Hand (can be Gold), then create a copy in your Hand of a card of the same color in your opponent’s Deck.

card.name: Korathi Heatwave
card.text: Apply Drought on all Rows on your opponent's side. Drought: Every Turn, at the start of your Turn, Damage one of the Lowest Units on the row by 2.

card.name: Lambert
card.text: Play Vesemir and Eskel from your deck.

card.name: Manticore Venom
card.text: Damage 5 adjacent Units by 4.

card.name: Marching Orders
card.text: Boost 1 of the Lowest Bronze or Silver Units in your Deck by 2 and play it.

card.name: Merigold's Hailstorm
card.text: Damage all Units on a row by half their Power (rounding down and ignoring Armor).

card.name: Myrgtabrakke
card.text: Deploy: Damage Units by 2, 2 and then 1.

card.name: Necromancy-
card.text: Banish a Unit from either Graveyard and Boost an Ally by its Power.

card.name: Ocvist
card.text: After 4 turns, at the start of your turn, Damage all Enemies by 1, return this Unit to your Hand and Transform it into Exhausted Ocvist. Exhausted Ocvist: 6 Strength, Siege, Draconid, Loyal, Silver. No ability.

card.name: Olgierd von Everec
card.text: When this Unit is Discarded or Destroyed, Weaken it by half (rounding up). At the start of Rounds 2 and 3, Resurrect this Unit, if it is in the Graveyard.

card.name: Operator

prop.type: Ranged, Mage, Doomed, Stubborn, Loyal, Epic

card.text: Deploy: Choose a Bronze Unit in your Hand and create a base copy of it in both players' Hands.

card.name: Prize-Winning Cow
card.text: Retaliation: Spawn a Chort on the row. Deathwish: Spawn a Chort on the row. Chort: 6 Strength, Agile, Relict, Loyal, Bronze. Deploy, Brave: Strengthen self by 4.

card.name: Ragh Nar Roog
card.text: Apply Ragh Nar Roog to all rows on your opponent’s side. Ragh Nar Roog: Every turn, at the start of your turn, damage 1 of the Highest Units on the row by 2.

card.name: Regis
card.text: Timer 2, Turn Start, Boost self by 7, if you are winning the Round.

card.name: Regis: Higher Vampire
card.text: Deploy: Look at 3 random Bronze Units from your opponent's Deck. Consume 1, Boost self by base Power of consumed Unit, then shuffle the others back.

card.name: Renew
card.text: Resurrect a Gold Unit from your Graveyard.

card.name: Roach
card.text: Whenever you play a Gold Unit from your Hand, play Roach from your Deck on a random row before that Unit's Deploy ability resolves.

card.name: Royal Decree-
card.text: Play a Gold card from your Deck. Shuffle the others back..

card.name: Sarah
card.text: Deploy: Shuffle a card from your Hand (can be Gold) back into your Deck, then draw the top different card of the same color from your Deck.

card.name: Scorch
card.text: Destroy all the Highest Units.

card.name: Skellige Storm
card.text: Apply Skellige Storm to a row on your opponent’s side. Skelige Storm: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage the leftmost units on the row by 2, 2 and 1, respectively.

card.name: Summoning Circle

prop.type: Summoning Circle, Neutral, Special, Event, Epic

card.text: Spawn a base copy of the last Enemy your opponent played from their Hand.

card.name: The Last Wish
card.text: Draw your top 2 Bronze or Silver cards. Play 1 and shuffle the other back.

card.name: Triss Merigold
card.text: Deploy: Damage a Unit by 5.

card.name: Triss: Butterflies
card.text: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Boost all other Lowest Allies by 1.

card.name: Unicorn

prop.type: Siege, Doomed, Beast, Loyal, Yennefer Token

card.text: Deploy: Boost all other Units by 2.

card.name: Vaedermakar
card.text: Play a Weather card from your Deck.

card.name: Vesemir
card.text: Deploy: Play Eskel and Lambert from your Deck.

card.name: Villentretenmerth
card.text: After 3 turns, at the start of your turn, Destroy all the Highest Units on the Board.

card.name: White Frost
card.text: Apply Frost to a row on your opponent’s side and the row above it. Frost: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage one of the Lowest Units on the row by 2.

card.name: Yennefer of Vengerberg
card.text: Deploy: Spawn a Unicorn or a Chironex. Unicorn: 1 Strength, Siege, Doomed, Beast, Loyal, Silver. Deploy: Boost all other Units by 2. Chironex: 1 Strength, Siege, Doomed, Beast, Loyal, Silver. Deploy: Damage all other Units by 2.

card.name: Yennefer: Conjurer
card.text: Turn Start: Damage the Highest Enemy/Enemies by 1.

card.name: Zoltan: Scoundrel
card.text: Deploy: Spawn Field Marshal Duda Companion or Field Marshal Duda Agitator. Field Marshal Duda: Agitator; 1 Strength, Agile, Doomed, Beast, Disloyal, Silver. Deploy: Damage 2 adjacent Units on either side by 2. Field Marshal Duda: Companion; 1 Strength, Agile, Doomed, Beast, Loyal, Silver. Deploy: Boost 2 adjacent Units on either side by 2.

card.name: Alzur's Double–Cross
card.text: Boost one of the Highest Bronze or Silver Units in your Deck by 2, and play it.

card.name: Bekker's Dark Mirror
card.text: Swap the Power of the Highest and Lowest Unit on the Board.

card.name: Carlo Varese
card.text: Deploy: Toggle a Unit’s Lock.

card.name: Commander's Horn
card.text: Boost 5 adjacent units by 4.

card.name: Cyprian Wiley
card.text: Deploy: Weaken a Unit by 3 or Destroy an Ambush Unit.

card.name: Decoy
card.text: Return an Ally to your Hand, Boost it by 3 and play it.

card.name: Adrenaline Rush
card.text: Toggle a Unit’s Resilience.

card.name: Alzur's Thunder
card.text: Remove 7 strength from a non-Gold unit.

card.name: Arachas Venom
card.text: Damage 3 adjacent Units by 4. .

card.name: Biting Frost
card.text: Apply Frost to a row on your opponent’s side. Frost: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage the Lowest Unit on the row by 2.

card.name: Clear Skies
card.text: Spawn Clear Skies or Rally. Clear Skies: Event, Doomed, Bronze. Trigger all Weather on your side, then clear all Weather from your side. Rally: Event, Doomed, Bronze. Play a random Bronze Unit from your Deck.

card.name: Dimeritium Bomb
card.text: Choose 3 adjacent units. Reset them to base strength. Convert affected Gold units to Silver or Bronze (their original color).

card.name: Dimeritium Shackles
card.text: Lock or Unlock any unit on the battlefield. If Gold, convert it to Silver (or Bronze, if that was its original color). Locked units lose all tokens and have no ability until replayed or moved to a hand.

card.name: Elder Bear

prop.type: Melee, Cursed, Beast, Loyal, Raging Berserker Token

card.text: No Ability.

card.name: Epidemic
card.text: Destroy the weakest non-Gold unit(s) on the battlefield.

card.name: Impenetrable Fog
card.text: Apply Fog to a row on your opponent's side. Fog: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage the Highest Unit on the row by 2.

card.name: Lacerate
card.text: Damage all units on a row by 3.

card.name: Petri's Philter
card.text: Boost 3 adjacent Units by 3 and add 3 Armor to them.

card.name: Stammelford's Tremors
card.text: Damage up to 6 random Enemies by 2.

card.name: Swallow
card.text: Boost a Unit by 8.

card.name: Thunderbolt Potion
card.text: Boost 3 adjacent units by 4.

card.name: Torrential Rain
card.text: Apply Rain to a row on your opponent’s side. Rain: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage up to 5 of the Lowest Units on the row by 1.

card.name: Bloodcurdling Roar
card.text: Destroy an Ally. Spawn a Bear. Bear: Agile, Beast, Doomed, Loyal, Bronze. No Ability.

card.name: Mardroeme
card.text: Reset a Unit and Strengthen it by 3; or Reset a Unit and Weaken it by 3. Mutagen: Event, Doomed, Bronze. Reset a Unit and Strengthen it by 3. Spores: Event, Doomed, Bronze. Reset a Unit and Weaken it by 3.

card.name: Quen Sign
card.text: Choose a Unit in your Hand. Give all copies of it in your Hand and Deck a Shield and Boost them by 2. Units which already have Shield cannot be chosen and aren't affected.

card.name: Shrike
card.text: Boost up to 6 random Allies by 2.

card.name: Dagon
card.text: Spawn: Dagon. Deploy: Spawn Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog or Torrential Rain.

card.name: Eredin Bréacc Glas

prop.type: Agile, Doomed, Stubborn, Wild Hunt, Loyal, Legendary

card.text: Spawn: Eredin. Deploy: Spawn a Bronze Wild Hunt Unit. Note: Removed Weather Immunity. Note: Removed Eredin token.

card.name: Unseen Elder

prop.type: Agile, Doomed, Stubborn, Vampire, Loyal, Legendary

card.text: Spawn: Unseen Elder. Deploy: Deploy: Consume 3 Allies, but Strengthen this unit by their power instead of Boosting.

card.name: Woodland Spirit
card.text: Deploy: Spawn 3 Rabid Wolves and apply Fog to the opposite row. Note: Removed Weather Immunity. Rabid Wolf: 1 Strength, Melee, Beast, Loyal, Bronze.

card.name: Caranthir Ar-Feiniel

prop.type: Agile, Wild Hunt, Mage, Loyal, Legendary

card.text: Deploy: Move 3 Enemies to this Unit's row on your opponent's side and apply Frost to that row on that side only.

card.name: Caretaker
card.text: Deploy: Resurrect a unit from your opponent’s Graveyard.

card.name: Draug
card.text: Deploy: Damage a random Enemy by 1 (ignoring Armor). Repeat 6 times.

card.name: Ge'els
card.text: Deploy: Draw the top Gold card and top Silver card from your Deck. Play one and return the other to the top of your Deck.

card.name: Imlerith
card.text: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 4. If the Enemy is under Frost, Damage it by 8 instead.

card.name: Katakan
card.text: Deploy: Consume a Unit from either Graveyard.

card.name: Kayran
card.text: Deploy: Consume a Unit from your Hand, then Boost self by an additional 8.

card.name: Miruna
card.text: If played on your opponent’s side, then after 2 turns, at the end of your turn, move the Highest other Unit on its row to your side.

card.name: Old Speartip
card.text: If at the start of your turn there are 2 or fewer Units on the opposite row, fall asleep. Deploy: Damage up to 5 Enemies on the opposite row by 2.

card.name: Old Speartip: Asleep
card.text: If at the start of your turn there are 3 or more Units on the opposite row, wake up. Deploy: Boost Units adjacent to this Unit by 1. Old Speartip: Awake - 10 Strength, Agile, Ogroid, Loyal, Gold. If at the start of your turn there are 2 or fewer Units on the opposite row, fall asleep. Deploy: Damage up to 5 Enemies on the opposite row by 2.

card.name: Abaya
card.text: Deploy: Spawn Torrential Rain, Clear Skies or Lacerate.

card.name: Brewess
card.text: Play all Crone units from your deck.

card.name: Frightener: Dormant
card.text: Deploy: Move a Unit on another row on this side to this row. Draw the top card from your Deck.

card.name: Colossal Ifrit
card.text: Deploy: Spawn 3 Lesser Fire Elementals.

card.name: Imperial Manticore
card.text: Deploy, Brave: Strengthen self by 4.

card.name: Jotunn

prop.type: Jotunn, Monsters, Ogroid, Agile, Loyal, Epic

card.text: Deploy: Move 3 adjacent Enemies to this Unit’s row on their side and Damage them by 2.

card.name: Maerolorn
card.text: Deploy: Trigger the Deathwish of 3 Units to the right.

card.name: Monster Nest
card.text: Spawn a Bronze Necrophage or Insectoid Unit and Boost it by 2.

card.name: Mourntart
card.text: After 1 turn, at the start of your turn, Consume all Units in your Graveyard, but only Boost self by 1 for each.

card.name: Nithral
card.text: Frost Damage on your opponent’s side is increased to 3.

card.name: Toad Prince
card.text: Discard a non-Gold unit and absorb its strength, then draw a card.

card.name: Weavess
card.text: Play all Crone units from your deck.

card.name: Whispess
card.text: Play all Crone units from your deck.

card.name: Ancient Foglet
card.text: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Boost self by 1 if Fog is anywhere on the Board.

card.name: Arachas Behemoth
card.text: Whenever an Ally Consumes a card, Spawn an Arachas Drone and Damage self by 1 (ignoring Armor). Deploy: Gain 2 Armor.

card.name: Arachas Drone
card.text: Deploy: Play all Arachas Drones from your Deck.

card.name: Archgriffin
card.text: Deploy: Clear Weather from the row on your side.

card.name: Celaeno Harpy
card.text: Deploy: Spawn 2 Harpy Eggs to the left of this Unit. Harpy Egg: 1 Strength, Agile, Doomed, Loyal, Bronze. When Consumed by another Unit, Boost that Unit by an additional 5. Deathwish: Spawn a Harpy on a random row.

card.name: Chort
card.text: Deploy, Brave: Strengthen self by 4

card.name: Primordial D'ao
card.text: Deploy: Give this Unit a Shield. Deathwish: Spawn 2 Lesser Earth Elementals at the end of the row Lesser Earth Elemental: 2 Strength, Melee, Doomed, Construct, Loyal, Bronze.

card.name: Drowner
card.text: Deploy: Move a Unit to this row on its side.

card.name: Ekimmara
card.text: Deploy: Gain Resilience. Deploy: Consume an Ally.

card.name: Fiend
card.text: Deploy: Toggle a Unit’s Lock. If it’s an Enemy, Damage it by half its Power (rounding down and ignoring Armor).

card.name: Foglet
card.text: Whenever you apply Fog to an opposing row, play this Unit from your Deck or Resurrect it on that row on your side. When all Fog has been cleared from the Board, Destroy this Unit.

card.name: Ghoul
card.text: Deploy: Consume a random unit from either Graveyard.

card.name: Harpy-
card.text: Deploy: Trigger the Deathwish of Units adjacent to this Unit.

card.name: Harpy Egg
card.text: When Consumed by another Unit, Boost that Unit by an additional 5. Deathwish: Spawn a Harpy on a random row.

card.name: Ice Giant
card.text: If Frost is anywhere on the Board, Boost self by 5. When the last Frost is cleared, Damage self by 5.

card.name: Nekker
card.text: Whenever an Ally Consumes a card while this Unit is in your Hand, Deck or on your side of the Board, Boost self by 1. Deathwish: Play a Nekker from your Deck.

card.name: Nekker Warrior
card.text: Deploy: Choose a Bronze Ally and create 2 base copies of it on the bottom of your Deck.

card.name: Griffin-
card.text: Deploy: Move a card from one Graveyard to the other.

card.name: Vran Warrior
card.text: Deploy: Consume the Unit to the right. Every 2 turns, at the start of your turn, Consume the Unit to the right.

card.name: Wild Hunt Hound
card.text: Deploy: Play a Biting Frost card from your Deck.

card.name: Wild Hunt Navigator
card.text: Deploy: Choose a different Bronze Wild Hunt Ally. Play a copy of it from your Deck.

card.name: Wild Hunt Rider
card.text: At the end of the Round, keep this Unit on the Board if you lost. If this Unit is part of a Trio at the end of your turn, Boost it by 1.

card.name: Wild Hunt Warrior
card.text: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 3. If it was Destroyed, Boost self by 2.

card.name: Wyvern
card.text: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 3.

card.name: Brouver Hoog

prop.type: Agile, Doomed, Stubborn, Dwarf, Loyal, Legendary

card.text: Spawn Brouver Hoog. Deploy: Play a Silver Unit from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.

card.name: Eithné

prop.type: Agile, Doomed, Stubborn, Dryad, Loyal, Legendary

card.text: Spawn Eithné. Deploy: Resurrect a Special card..

card.name: Francesca Findabair

prop.type: Agile, Doomed, Stubborn, Elf, Loyal, Legendary

card.text: Spawn: Francesca. Deploy: Mulligan up to 3 cards.

card.name: Aglaïs
card.text: Deploy: You may Resurrect a Special card from your opponent's Graveyard. If you do, Weaken self by 4.

card.name: Iorveth
card.text: Whenever an Enemy moves to a different row, Damage it by 2. Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 4.

card.name: Isengrim Faoiltiarna
card.text: Play a Bronze or Silver Ambush card from your Deck.

card.name: Ithlinne Aegli
card.text: Deploy: Play a Bronze Special card from your Deck, then Spawn a copy of it. Shuffle the others back.

card.name: Milva
card.text: Deploy: If neither player has passed, return the Highest Enemy to your opponent's Hand, then return the Highest Ally to your Hand.

card.name: Saesenthessis
card.text: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each Dwarf Ally (including Golds). Damage an Enemy by the number of Elf Allies (including Golds).

card.name: Saskia
card.text: Orders: Play this Unit from your Deck on a random row.

card.name: Schirrú
card.text: Deploy: You may Transform a card from your Hand (can be Gold) into Scorch.

card.name: Zoltan Chivay
card.text: Deploy: Move 3 Units to this row on their side. If they are Allies, Strengthen them by 2.

card.name: Aelirenn
card.text: Play from deck when 5 or more Elves are on your side.

card.name: Barclay Els
card.text: Deploy: Play a random Bronze or Silver Dwarf from your Deck and Boost it by 3.

card.name: Braenn
card.text: Remove an amount equal to this unit's strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.

card.name: Ciaran aep Easnillen
card.text: Deploy: Toggle a Unit's Lock and move it to this row on its side.

card.name: Dennis Cranmer
card.text: Deploy: Strengthen all other Bronze and Silver Dwarves in your Deck, Hand and on your side of the Board by 1.

card.name: Ele'yas
card.text: Deploy: Destroy an Ally and Damage an Enemy by the Destroyed Ally's Power.

card.name: Ida Emean aep Sivney
card.text: Deploy: Spawn Impenetrable Fog, Clear Skies or Quen Sign.

card.name: Malena
card.text: Every turn, at the start of your turn, move a random Unit on another row on this side to this row. Deploy: Gain 3 Armor.

card.name: Morenn
card.text: Ambush: When an Enemy appears, turn this Unit over and Damage that Enemy by 5.

card.name: Nature's Gift
card.text: Play a Bronze or Silver Special card from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.

card.name: Sheldon Skaggs
card.text: Deploy: Move all Units on the row to random rows on the same side and Boost self by 1 for each.

card.name: Toruviel
card.text: Ambush: When your opponent passes, turn this Unit over and Boost 2 Units on each side by 2.

card.name: Yaevinn
card.text: Deploy: Draw the top Unit and top Special card from your Deck. Keep 1 and shuffle the other back.

card.name: Yarpen Zigrin
card.text: Whenever a Dwarf Ally (including Golds) is played, Boost self by 1. Deploy: Gain Resilience

card.name: Blue Mountain Commando
card.text: Whenever this Unit is moved, Boost it by 2. Deploy: Play all Blue Mountain Commandos from your Deck.

card.name: Dol Blathanna Archer
card.text: Deploy: Damage Enemies by 3 and then 1.

card.name: Dol Blathanna Bomber
card.text: Deploy: Spawn a Fireball Trap on an opposing row.

card.name: Dol Blathanna Bowman
card.text: Every time this Unit is moved, Damage a random Enemy by 2. Deploy: Damage a Unit by 2.

card.name: Dol Blathanna Protector
card.text: Whenever you play a Special card, Boost this Unit by 1 while in your Hand, Deck or on your side of the Board. Dol Blathanna Protector will not be buffed by Gold cards played.

card.name: Dwarven Mercenary
card.text: Deploy: Move a Unit on another row to this row on its side. If it's an Ally, Boost it by 3.

card.name: Dwarven Skirmisher
card.text: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 3. If the Unit was not Destroyed, Boost self by 2.

card.name: Elven Mercenary
card.text: Deploy: Draw the top 2 Bronze Special cards in your Deck. Play 1 and shuffle the other back.

card.name: Hawker Healer
card.text: Deploy: Boost 2 Units to the right by 3.

card.name: Hawker Smuggler
card.text: Whenever a Unit appears on your opponent's side, Boost self by 1.

card.name: Hawker Support
card.text: Deploy: Boost a Unit in your Hand by 3.

card.name: Incinerating Trap
card.text: After 1 turn, at the end of your turn, damage all other Units on the Row by 2 strength and banish self.

card.name: Mahakam Defender
card.text: Deploy: Gain Resilience.

card.name: Mahakam Guard
card.text: Deploy: Boost an Ally by 3. If it's a Dwarf, Boost by 4 instead.

card.name: Vrihedd Brigade
card.text: Deploy: Clear Weather from the row on your side and move a Unit to this row on its side.

card.name: Vrihedd Dragoon
card.text: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Boost a random Loyal Unit in your Hand by 1.

card.name: Vrihedd Neophyte
card.text: Whenever you Mulligan a card, Damage a random Enemy by 2.

card.name: Vrihedd Officer
card.text: Deploy: Mulligan a card.

card.name: Vrihedd Sappers
card.text: Ambush: After 2 turns, at the start of your turn, turn this Unit over.

card.name: Vrihedd Vanguard
card.text: Whenever you Mulligan a card, Boost self by 1 while in your Hand, Deck or on your side of the Board.

card.name: Wardancer
card.text: Whenever you Mulligan this Unit, play it from your Deck immediately.

card.name: Bran Tuirseach
card.text: Spawn King Bran. Deploy: Discard up to 3 cards from your Deck and Strengthen all Units among them by 1. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Crach an Craite
card.text: Spawn: Crach an Craite. Deploy: Play the Highest Loyal Bronze or Silver Unit in your Deck, Strengthen it by 3 and Damage it by 1.

card.name: Harald the Cripple
card.text: Spawn Harald the Cripple. Deploy: Damage a Unit by 5. If this Destroys it, repeat this ability with Damage Power reduced by 1.

card.name: Birna Bran
card.text: Deploy: Move a Unit from your opponent's Graveyard to yours. Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage self by 1 and Units adjacent to this Unit by 2.

card.name: Cerys an Craite
card.text: After 4 Units are Resurrected on your side while this Unit is in the Graveyard, Resurrect it.

card.name: Coral
card.text: Deploy: Pick a Unit and Damage all Units on its row by half their Power (rounding down and ignoring Armor).

card.name: Ermion
card.text: Deploy: Draw the top 2 cards from your Deck, then Discard 2 cards (can be Golds) from your Hand.

card.name: Hjalmar an Craite
card.text: Deploy: Spawn Lord of Undvik on the leftmost side of the opposite row. Lord of Undvik - 5 Strength, Agile, Doomed, Ogroid, Disloyal, Silver. When removed from the battlefield, add 10 strength to any Hjalmars on the opposite side.

card.name: Kambi
card.text:
After 3 turns, at the start of your turn, Spawn Hemdall.
Hemdall: 16 Strength, Melee, Doomed, Disloyal, Gold. Deploy: Destroy all Units on the Board. Clear all Weather. Banish all Allied Kambis.

card.name: Madman Lugos
card.text: Deploy: Discard a Bronze Unit from your Deck and Damage a Unit by the Discarded Unit's base Power.

card.name: Vabjorn
card.text: Every turn, at the end of your turn, Damage by 2 every Damaged Enemy with 2 Power or less.

card.name: Wild Boar of the Sea
card.text: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Strengthen the Unit to the left by 1 and Damage the Unit to the right by 1.

card.name: Blueboy Lugos
card.text: Veteran 1. Deploy: Spawn a Spectral Whale on your opponent's side. Spectral Whale: 3 Strength, Agile, Doomed, Specter, Disloyal, Silver. Every turn, at the start of your turn move this unit to a random row on its side and Damage all other Units on the Row by 1.

card.name: Champion of Hov
card.text: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Strengthen this Unit by 2 if it is the only Unit on the row.

card.name: Djenge Frett
card.text: Veteran 1. Deploy: Damage 3 Allies by 1 and Strengthen self by 1 for each.

card.name: Donar an Hindar
card.text: Veteran: 1. Deploy: Toggle a Unit's Lock. Discard a random Bronze card from your opponent's Deck to your Graveyard.

card.name: Draig Bon-Dhu
card.text: Deploy: Strengthen up to 2 Units in your Graveyard by 3.

card.name: Gremist
card.text: Deploy: Spawn Impenetrable Fog, Clear Skies or Bloodcurdling Roar.

card.name: Holger Blackhand
card.text: Veteran 1. Deploy: Damage a Unit by 5. If it was Destroyed, Strengthen 1 of the Highest Units in your Graveyard by 3.

card.name: Jutta an Dimun
card.text: Veteran 1. Deploy: Damage self by 1.

card.name: Morkvarg
card.text: Whenever this Unit is Discarded or Destroyed, Resurrect it and Weaken it by half its Power (rounding up).

card.name: Restore-
card.text: Return a Unit from your Graveyard to your Hand, then Discard a card from your Hand.

card.name: Sigrdrifa
card.text: Deploy: Resurrect a Unit.

card.name: Skjall
card.text: Veteran 1. After 2 turns, at the end of your turn, convert this Unit's current Power into base Power.

card.name: Svanrige Tuirseach
card.text: Veteran: Strengthen self by 1. Deploy: Draw a card (including Golds) then Discard a card from your Hand.

card.name: Udalryk
card.text: Deploy: Draw the top 2 cards from your Deck. Keep one and Discard the other.

card.name: An Craite Armorsmith
card.text: Veteran: Strengthen self by 1. Deploy: Heal 3 Units to the left.

card.name: An Craite Blacksmith
card.text: Veteran: Strengthen self by 1. Deploy: Strengthen a Unit by 2.

card.name: An Craite Longship
card.text: Whenever you Discard a Unit, Damage a random Enemy by 2.

card.name: An Craite Raider
card.text: Veteran: 1. Whenever this Unit is Discarded, Resurrect it immediately.

card.name: An Craite Warcrier
card.text: Veteran: 1. Deploy: Boost 3 Damaged Units to the left by half their Power (rounding up).

card.name: An Craite Warrior
card.text: Veteran: 1. Deploy: Damage self by 1.

card.name: Brokvar Hunter
card.text: Whenever a Unit adjacent to this Unit is Damaged, Strengthen self by 1. Deploy: Damage a Unit by 3.

card.name: Dimun Light Longship
card.text: Every turn, at the start of your turn, Damage the Unit to the right by 1, then Strengthen self by 2.

card.name: Dimun Pirate
card.text: Veteran: Strengthen self by 1. Deploy: Discard all copies of this Unit from your Deck.

card.name: Dimun Pirate Captain
card.text: Veteran: 1. Whenever you Discard a Unit, Boost self by 1 while in your Hand, Deck or on your side of the Board.

card.name: Drummond Queensguard
card.text: Deploy: Resurrect all your Queensguards.

card.name: Drummond Shieldmaid
card.text: Deploy: Damage a Unit by 2. If it was already Damaged, play a Clan Drummond Shieldmaiden from your Deck.

card.name: Heymaey Skald
card.text: Veteran: Strengthen self by 1. Deploy: Boost 3 Units to the left by 3, 2 and 1 respectively.

card.name: Priestess of Freya
card.text: Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze Unit from your Graveyard.

card.name: Savage Bear
card.text: After an Enemy is played from any Hand and its Deploy ability resolves, Damage it by 1.

card.name: Svalblod Butcher
card.text: Strengthen self by 1 for each Damaged Ally (including Golds), then Damage self by 1.

card.name: Svalblod Ravager
card.text: Retaliation: Transform into a Raging Bear. Raging Bear: 10 Strength, Melee, Cursed, Beast, Loyal, Bronze. No Ability.

card.name: Tuirseach Archer
card.text: Veteran: 1. Deploy: Damage 3 Units by 1.

card.name: Tuirseach Axeman
card.text: Deploy: Gain 2 Armor. Whenever an Enemy is Damaged, Boost self by 1.

card.name: Tuirseach Skirmisher
card.text: Veteran: Strengthen self by 1. Whenever this Unit enters the Graveyard, Strengthen it by 3.

card.name: Emhyr var Emreis
card.text: Spawn Emhyr var Emreis. Deploy: Return an Ally to your Hand, then play a card from your Hand (can be Gold).

card.name: Jan Calveit
card.text: Spawn John Calveit. Deploy: Look at the top 3 Bronze or Silver cards in your Deck. Play 1. The others remain on top.

card.name: Morvran Voorhis
card.text: Spawn Morvran Voorhis. Deploy: Reveal up to 3 cards from either player's Hand (can be Golds).

card.name: Assassination
card.text: Lock and Destroy an Enemy.

card.name: Cahir Dyffryn
card.text: Deploy: If playing as Nilfgaard, trigger your Leader's Deploy ability.

card.name: Letho of Gulet
card.text: Deploy: If Spying, set own base Power to 1. Deploy: Banish 2 Units to each side of this Unit and Boost this Unit by their Power.

card.name: Leo Bonhart
card.text: Deploy: Reveal a Unit in your Hand (can be Gold) and Damage an Enemy by its Base Power.

card.name: Menno Coehoorn
card.text: Deploy: Destroy all Spying Enemies.

card.name: Rainfarn of Attre
card.text: Deploy: Play a Disloyal Unit from your Deck. Shuffle the others back.

card.name: Stefan Skellen
card.text: Deploy: Choose any card from your Deck and place it on top. Then shuffle the rest of your Deck.

card.name: Tibor Eggebracht
card.text: Deploy: If neither player has passed, Boost self by 15, then your opponent draws the top Bronze card from their Deck and Reveals it.

card.name: Vattier de Rideaux
card.text: Deploy: Reveal up to 2 cards from your Hand (can be Golds). For each, Reveal 1 random card from your opponent's Hand (can be Gold).

card.name: Vilgefortz
card.text: Deploy: Destroy an Ally, then play a top card from your Deck (including Golds) or Clash: Destroy an Enemy, then your opponent draws a revealed Bronze card.

card.name: Xarthisius
card.text: Deploy: Look at the top 3 cards in your opponent's Deck. You may move 1 to the bottom of their Deck.

card.name: Albrich
card.text: Deploy: If neither player has passed, each player draws the top card from their Deck. Your opponent's card is Revealed.

card.name: Assire var Anahid
card.text: Deploy: Shuffle up to 2 cards from either Graveyard into that player's Deck.

card.name: Auckes
card.text: Deploy: Toggle 2 Units' Lock. If Enemies, Damage them by 1 as well.

card.name: Cantarella
card.text: Deploy: Draw the top card from your Deck. Keep it, or place it at the bottom of your Deck and draw the new top card.

card.name: Ceallach Dyffryn
card.text: Deploy: Move 2 Bronze Spying Enemies to your side.

card.name: Cynthia
card.text: Deploy: Reveal 1 of the Highest Units in your opponent's Hand (including Golds) and Boost self by its Power.

card.name: False Ciri
card.text: If this Unit is Spying at the start of your turn, Boost it by 1. If it is Spying when your opponent passes, move it to the opposite side. Deploy: When you play this Unit on your side, Strengthen it by 3.

card.name: Fringilla Vigo
card.text: Deploy: If Spying, set own base Power to 1. Deploy: Set the Power of the Unit on the right to that of the Unit on the left.

card.name: Joachim de Wett
card.text: Deploy: Play the top Loyal Bronze or Silver Unit in your Deck and Boost it by 10.

card.name: Peter Saar Gwynleve
card.text: Deploy: Reset a Unit. If it's an Ally, Strengthen it by 3. If it's an Enemy, Weaken it by 3.

card.name: Serrit
card.text: Deploy: Set the Power of a Revealed Unit in your opponent's Hand to 1.

card.name: Sweers
card.text: Deploy: Choose an Enemy or a Revealed opposing Unit and move all copies of it from your opponent's Deck to their Graveyard.

card.name: The Guardian
card.text: Deathwish: Create 2 Lesser Guardians (6 strength, no ability) on the top of your opponent's Deck.

card.name: Treason
card.text: Play the bottom card from your opponent's Deck..

card.name: Vanhemar
card.text: Deploy: Spawn Biting Frost, Clear Skies or Stammelford's Tremors.

card.name: Alba Pikeman
card.text: After 2 turns, at the start of your turn, play an Alba Pikeman on the row.Deploy: Gain 2 Armor.

card.name: Alba Spearman
card.text: Deploy: Give this Unit a Shield.

card.name: Alchemist
card.text: Deploy: Reveal a card.

card.name: Ambassador
card.text: Deploy: Boost an Ally by 10.

card.name: Combat Engineer
card.text: Deploy: Toggle a Unit's Resilience.

card.name: Daerlan Soldier
card.text: When this Unit is Revealed, play it and draw the top card from your Deck.

card.name: Deithwen Arbalest
card.text: Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 3. If it was Boosted, Damage it by 5 instead.

card.name: Emissary
card.text: Deploy: Draw the top 2 Bronze Units (not including Emissaries) from your Deck. Play 1 and shuffle the other back.

card.name: Vicovaro Medic
card.text: Deploy: Resurrect a Bronze Unit from your opponent's Graveyard.

card.name: Fire Scorpion
card.text: Whenever this Unit is Revealed, Damage a random Enemy by 3. Deploy: Damage an Enemy by 3.

card.name: Impera Brigade
card.text: Whenever you play a Spying Unit (including Golds), Boost self by 2. Deploy: Boost self by 2 for each Spying Enemy (including Golds).

card.name: Impera Enforcers
card.text: Deploy: Look at the top card in your Deck. If it's Bronze, gain 2 Armor. If it's Silver, Boost self by 1. If it's Gold, Promote self.

card.name: Imperial Golem
card.text: Orders: Summon this Unit.

card.name: Mangonel
card.text: Whenever a card is Revealed, Damage a random Enemy by 2.

card.name: Nauzicaa Brigade
card.text: Deploy: Damage a Spying Unit by 5. If it was Destroyed, Strengthen self by 4.

card.name: Nauzicaa Sergeant
card.text: Deploy: Clear Weather from the row on your side and Boost 1 Ally or Revealed Unit in your Hand by 3

card.name: Nilfgaardian Knight
card.text: Deploy: Gain 2 Armor. Deploy: Reveal a random card from your Hand (can be Gold).

card.name: Rot Tosser
card.text: Deploy: Spawn a Cow Carcass on your opponent's row. Cow Carcass: 1 Strength, Agile, Doomed, Beast, Disloyal, Bronze. Timer 2, Turn End: Destroy the Weakest Unit(s) on the row, then Banish this Unit.

card.name: Spotter
card.text: Whenever either player Reveals a card, Boost self by 1 while in your Hand, Deck or on your side of the Board.

card.name: Vicovaro Novice
card.text: Deploy: Trigger the ability of a Spying Enemy Ambassador or Emissary.

prop.type: Melee, Cursed, Beast, Loyal, Bronze No Ability.

card.name: Hemdall
card.text: Deploy: Destroy all Units on the Board. Clear all Weather. Banish all Allied Kambis.

card.name: Lord of Undvik
card.text: When removed from the battlefield, add 10 strength to any Hjalmars on the opposite side.

card.name: Spectral Whale
card.text: Every turn, at the start of your turn move this unit to a random row on its side and Damage all other Units on the Row by 1.

card.name: Cow Carcass
card.text: Timer 2, Turn End: Destroy the Weakest Unit(s) on the row, then Banish this Unit.

card.name: Fireball Trap
card.text: After 1 turn, at the end of your turn, damage all other Units on the Row by 2 strength and banish self
